source_text: In addition, IPT will assume responsibility for a 2% net smelter return royalty payable with respect to tenements held by BHA.
additional_details: The royalty is a 2% net smelter return royalty. IPT (Impact Minerals Limited) will assume responsibility for paying this royalty. The recipient of the royalty is not explicitly stated in the document, but it is payable with respect to tenements held by BHA (BHA No. 1 Pty Ltd).
